## RAG Evaluation Pipeline Overview

> We evaluated **24 RAG pipelines** to understand how: (a) retrieval method, (b) model size, and (c) retrieval depth influence accuracy, latency, and cost.

    <th style="width:25%;">Parameter</th>
    <th style="width:75%;">Values</th>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td><strong>Approaches (6)</strong></td>
    <td>`openai_keyword`, `openai_semantic`, `lc_bm25`, `graph_eager`, `graph_mmr`, `vanilla`</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td><strong>Models (2)</strong></td>

> **Our Benchmark Q&A used:** 60 expert-validated UR5 Cobot safety questions.


## RAG Automated Evaluation: Accuracy, Latency, Cost

::::{.columns}
:::{.column width='45%' style='font-size:0.78em;'}
- **Accuracy:**  
  + `OpenAI Keyword` and `OpenAI Semantic` retrieval RAG-based approaches 
  + **86.66%** `gpt-5-mini` + `OpenAI Keyword` + `top-k=7` 

- **Latency:**  
  + `gpt-5-nano` produced faster responses (≈9.5 s) compared to `gpt-5-mini` (≈12 s).  
  + Retrieval approach mattered:  
    * **Fastest:** `BM25` (~6 s)  
    * **Slowest:** `Graph Eager/MMR` (≈15 s)  
    * `OpenAI Keyword` and `OpenAI Semantic` sat in the **middle** (≈9–10 s)  

- **Cost:**  
  + Cost differences across retrieval approaches are statistically significant but **practically small (fractions of a cent)**
:::

:::{.column width='53%' style='font-size:0.65em; text-align:center;'}
<br>
![](../../figs/time_cost_correctness.png)

Comparison of the performance of our 24 RAG pipelines across correctness (A), generation time, i.e., latency (B), and cost (C).
:::
::::


## Human Evaluation and Final Pipeline Selection

::::{.columns}
:::{.column width='60%' style='margin:1em 0em; font-size:0.7em;'}

### Human Expert Review

- Blind eval of responses from top-2 RAG pipelines.
- Eleven human evaluators reviewed 10 randomly selected questions.
- For each question, they selected which generated answer was closer to the gold reference.

### Results

- `OpenAI Keyword` preferred in **41%** of comparisons.
- `OpenAI Semantic` preferred in **26%** of comparisons.
- **33%** of evaluations were ties.

### Final Selection

- `gpt-5-mini-2025-08-07` + `OpenAI Keyword` + `top-k=7` as it is **most accuracte** with **acceptable latency** (~ 10 s) and **cost** (~ $0.005 per query).
:::

:::{.column width='38%' style='font-size:0.65em; text-align:center;'}
![](../../figs/qualtrics.png){width="85%"}

:::
::::
